Encounter.Name: Contact Draugar
Encounter.DescriptionText: You hail the Draugar captain. After a few short moments a crackling voice comes over the subspace communicator:

Message.Text: Hello SING , are you hungry today?

Response.Text: Tell them you want the Protection Contract off and you are going to kill them.

Message.Text: That is great news, I have a knack for SING colonists
Thank you, we will taste, hrmm, talk to you later.
